# Government Tender Announcement
## Inspection and Maintenance of Delta Direct Digital Control Systems

**Notice ID:** WS4401721521-Doc4465756031\
**Posting Date:** February 28, 2024\
**Closing Date:** Friday, March 14, 2024, 2:00 PM ET

### Tender Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested bidders to submit proposals for the furnishing of all required services, materials, tools, equipment, software, and firmware updates for the annual on-site inspection and repairs of Delta Version 3 Orcaview building automation systems at the Bathurst, Newcastle, and Campbellton Armouries.

### Contract Details

*   **Duration:** April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025, with an option to renew for two additional one-year periods
*   **Location:** Various locations in New Brunswick

### Mandatory Requirements

*   Bidder must provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, software, and firmware updates
*   Service Contract will be required to complete annual on-site inspection and repairs

### Tendering Procedure

This tender is being issued in French only, in accordance with the Government of Canada's official languages policy. The name of the proposed contractor will be disclosed within 90 days following the contract award.

Bidders are required to submit a proposal that includes a statement of work, method of inspection, maintenance, and repair, as well as any other necessary information.

### Eligibility Criteria

Bidders must meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the contract. Those who have already expressed interest in this bid are not precluded from participating.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated on the following criteria:

*   **Price: Lowest Price**
*   **Technical Solution:**

### Additional Information

Any additional information regarding this tender can be obtain by contacting Gary Bryant, Senior Contracting Officer at Public Works and Government Services Canada (`gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`).

### Attachments

None. 

### Online Procurement Tool

Bidders are invited to use the online procurement tool available at `https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18934402`.

***

This notice supersedes previous bid solicitation number W6898-240655_A dated January 25, 2024, with a closing of February 13, 2024.  All previous bid solicitation number W6898-240655_A have been cancelled.
